channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Log4j
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Log4j

item.title: CVE-2019-17571|2024-08-05T01:40:15.836Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- log4j
item.description: Included in Log4j 1.2 is a SocketServer class that is vulnerable to deserialization of untrusted data which can be exploited to remotely execute arbitrary code when combined with a deserialization gadget when listening to untrusted network traffic for log data. This affects Log4j versions up to 1.2 up to 1.2.17.
